projectDescription: Multi-domain command and control system integrating air, sea, land, space, and cyber operations with real-time threat assessment, decision support, secure communications, and interoperability with allied systems. Must meet DoD security standards and operate in contested environments.
initialRisks: Multi-domain integration complexity, cybersecurity threats, real-time performance under attack, interoperability with 20+ systems, classified information handling, adversarial AI threats
